event_item.title: $35#Class Rank 21
event_item.description: $33#[Applied On Purchase]$__An enchanted scroll containing the_knowledge of the $11#ancient masters$._ _When purchased, it will instantly elevate the character to $35#Class Rank 21$._

event_item.title: $35#Scroll of Enlightenment
event_item.description: $33#[Applied On Purchase]$____A mystical scroll imbued with the power to complete all quests._ _When purchased, it instantly grants the character completion of all current quests, rewarding them with the knowledge and experience of the $11#legendary heroes$._

event_item.title: $35#Bottle of Hidden Revelations
event_item.description: $33#[Applied On Purchase]$____A rare bottle that unveils the presence of a secret NPC._ _When purchased, it summons the enigmatic $11#Keeper of Secrets$._ Approach with caution, as the knowledge they possess is both powerful and perilous._

event_item.title: $35#Capsule of Limitless Power
event_item.description: $33#[Applied On Purchase]$____An ancient tome inscribed with the essence of limitless growth._ _ $11#100,000,000 Exp$_ $11#100,000,000 Skill Exp$_ $11#1,000,000 Wing Exp$_ $11#1,000,000,000 Honor Points$_ $11#100,000,000 Axp$._
